scripts.deploy:polygon: pnpm build:polygon && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ unvest/unvest-v2-polygon
scripts.deploy:mainnet: pnpm build:mainnet && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ unvest/unvest-v2-mainnet
scripts.deploy:optimism: pnpm build:optimism && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ unvest/unvest-v2-optimism
scripts.deploy:bsc: pnpm build:bsc && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ unvest/unvest-v2-bsc
scripts.deploy:arbitrum: pnpm build:arbitrum && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ unvest/unvest-v2-arbitrum
scripts.deploy:avalanche: pnpm build:avalanche && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ unvest/unvest-v2-avalanche
scripts.deploy:goerli: pnpm build:goerli && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ unvest/unvest-v2-goerli
scripts.deploy:mumbai: pnpm build:mumbai && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ unvest/unvest-v2-mumbai
scripts.deploy:optimism-goerli: pnpm build:optimism-goerli && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ unvest/unvest-v2-optimism-goerli
scripts.deploy:all-mainnets: pnpm deploy:polygon && pnpm deploy:mainnet && pnpm deploy:optimism && pnpm deploy:bsc && pnpm deploy:arbitrum && pnpm deploy:avalanche
scripts.deploy:all-testnets: pnpm deploy:goerli && pnpm deploy:mumbai && pnpm deploy:optimism-goerli
